instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00138: What is 820-00138? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no display (LCD not detected)
threads.message:
Hi there,

currently I'm struggeling with a MBP 2015 15" (<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>). It had some corrosion in the are arround the LVDS connector (on both sides of the MLB).
Now the USB port is not working and there is no internal display. Works fine with external display so far.
<SIGNAL>PP5VR3V3_SW_LCD</SIGNAL> goes high for some seconds when booting but drops to 0V then. 
<SIGNAL>LCD_CONN_HP</SIGNAL> does not go high. Display assembly works fine with other MLB. 
Already replaced the LVDS connector but it didn't changed anything.

Would be happy if someone has an idea where the issue is?

Best regards
Dudi

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no display (LCD not detected)
threads.message:
Probably corroded traces, or bad solders.
<SIGNAL>LCD_HPD</SIGNAL> must go high (at same time with  <SIGNAL>PP5VR3V3_SW_LCD</SIGNAL>), or PCH doesn't detect the display.
Be sure <RESISTOR>R8300</RESISTOR> is good.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no display (LCD not detected)
threads.message:
<RESISTOR>R8300</RESISTOR> is good, checked the traces - they seem to be fine too. 
Just tied a Screen for a late 2013 MBP - I know that it is not compatible but here I get an Image (without backlight) and stable 2.8V on <SIGNAL>LCD_HPD</SIGNAL>.
Tried another Known working screen for 2015 MBP but same issue here with missing <SIGNAL>LCD_HPD</SIGNAL>.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no display (LCD not detected)
threads.message: You have bad contacts into J8300, or incompatible screen.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no display (LCD not detected)
threads.message: I will replace and check J8300 again. The screen should be fine - it's the original one since I'm pretty sure the MBP was never opened before

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no display (LCD not detected)
threads.message: Did you try this screen with other good board?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no display (LCD not detected)
threads.message: Yes I did. With another 2015 Board. Works fine...
